al'amari: Duk wani abu da yake ɗaukar sarari kuma yana da taro
kashi: Tsaftataccen abu da aka yi da nau'in zarra guda ɗaya kawai
zarra: Karamin sashin kwayoyin halitta wanda zai iya shiga cikin halayen sinadaran
fili: Abun da aka yi da abubuwa biyu ko fiye da aka haɗa ta hanyar sinadarai
kwayoyin halitta: Rukunin atom da aka haɗe tare
cakuda: Haɗin abubuwa biyu ko fiye da ba a haɗa su da sinadarai ba
m: Halin kwayoyin halitta tare da takamaiman tsari da girma
iri-iri: Cakuda tare da abubuwan da ba na Uniform ba (misali, dakatarwa)
jihar: Form a cikin abin da kwayoyin halitta (m, ruwa, gas, plasma)
ruwa: Halin kwayoyin halitta tare da ƙayyadaddun ƙara amma babu takamaiman siffa
gas: Halin kwayoyin halitta ba tare da takamaiman siffa ko girma ba
dauki: Tsari inda abubuwa ke canzawa don samar da sababbin abubuwa
mai amsawa: Abun da ke fuskantar canji a cikin halayen sinadaran
samfur: Wani sabon abu da aka samu a cikin wani sinadari
bond: Tilasta riƙe atom ɗin tare a cikin kwayar halitta ko fili
dabarar sinadarai: Hanyar gajeriyar hanya ta wakiltar abu ta amfani da alamomi da lambobi
mafita: Cakuda kamanni na solute (narkar da abu) da sauran ƙarfi ( abu mai narkewa)
maida hankali: Adadin solute da aka narkar a cikin adadin da aka bayar
acid: Abubuwan da ke ba da gudummawar ions hydrogen (H+) a cikin ruwa
tushe: Abubuwan da ke karɓar ions hydrogen (H+) a cikin ruwa
neutralization: Amsa tsakanin acid da tushe, samar da gishiri da ruwa
sinadaran makamashi: Ƙarfi mai yuwuwa da aka adana a cikin haɗin sinadarai na abu
